page.title: 20A DAY IN MY LIFE
page.content: It was Wednesday. I got up quickly. It was 5 o'clock. I went to the bathroom, washed my face, brushed my teeth and went downstairs. When I opened the door of the sitting-room, everybody said,{"Happy {Eid"}in Pakistani. My mum said, "Go upstairs and get dressed, it's Eid today." I said, "Hurray,hurray, it's Eid." So I went upstairs, got dressed, put on my jewels, put on my make-up, and put on my new shoes. Then I went downstairs. My mum gave me some money and I went to my friend's house. I did not have my dinner at the right time.I played in the park, went to a lot of shops and{I ate, ate, ate {and played, played, played all day.
